attributes.action: Increase road safety in Shuttlewood, Chesterfield
attributes.additional_details: Chesterfield Road, Shuttlewood is a 30mph road and homes a wide range of people, from young children to the elderly with a school, local shop and children's playground. Too many drivers go down this road at ridiculous speeds and are putting people at risk on a daily basis. With a history of accidents and deaths, by putting these implements in place, we can reduce that risk.
attributes.background: Increase the safety of drivers and residents by installing crossings, speed humps and a camera on Chesterfield Road, Shuttlewood.
